Intro.content: Finally, fair insurance for internet income. Get protection for your earnings from social media and crypto hustle with instant payouts and no hidden fees.

facts.text: U.S. adults have had instagram accounts hacked

options.text: Insure any social media or crypto wallet (soon).
No hidden fees. What you see is what you get.
A faff-free process without the baffling questions.
Fully digital. Our Dashboard makes it easier than ever to manage your insurances.

FourthBlock.subTitle: From a collection of memories to content that generates income for you, we are here to protect your any digital assets.

options.text: A couple of questions is all we need. We promise not to ask anything sensitive about your income or personal data.
Tweak your cover. Choose coverage level of your monthly income in one click.
Our support team is always ready to provide useful advice or help to make a claim.

content.title: Hacking  and data theft
content.text: Cover your account from 3rd parties access.

content.title: Block & Ban
content.text: Сover any losses from outage in account work.

content.title: Reputational lawsuits
content.text: Negatives can react to your posts by claiming you’ve stolen their ideas,  disparaged or defamed them or their business or products.

content.title: Social engineering & fraud
content.text: Cover any money scams from your account.

content.title: Content or Device Insurance
content.text: Instant payout to cover damage, loss or theft of your content or your phone.

content.title: Sick or Injured
content.text: Simple and honest sick pay without doctors and waitings.

SevenBlock.content: Everyone deserves the opportunity to protect their quality of life and their future, which is why we made our insurance so that everyone can buy it in two clicks for the price of a launch.

BudgetBlock.endSubTitle: You can change your choice any time
